entry.title: MyST & Thebe: Community-driven tools for awesome open science communication with Jupyter[lite] backed computation
entry.summary:
Description

It's a powerful authoring framework that supports blogs, online books, scientific papers, preprints, reports and journals articles. It includes thebe a minimal connector library for Jupyter, and thebe-lite that bundles a JupyterLite server with pyodide into any web page for in-browser python. It also provides publication-ready tex and pdf …
entry.content:
Description

It's a powerful authoring framework that supports blogs, online books, scientific papers, preprints, reports and journals articles. It includes thebe a minimal connector library for Jupyter, and thebe-lite that bundles a JupyterLite server with pyodide into any web page for in-browser python. It also provides publication-ready tex and pdf generation from the same content base, minimising the rework of publishing to the web and traditional services.

entry.title: Working towards all the Geophysics, but Backwards
entry.summary:
Description

Geophysical inversions are tools for constructing models of the subsurface (images) given a finite amount of data. SimPEG (http://simpeg.xyz) is an effort to synthesize geophysical forward and inverse methodologies into a consistent framework. We will show seven geophysical methods based around a diamond exploration case study, combining …
entry.content:
Description

Geophysical inversions are tools for constructing models of the subsurface (images) given a finite amount of data. SimPEG (http://simpeg.xyz) is an effort to synthesize geophysical forward and inverse methodologies into a consistent framework. We will show seven geophysical methods based around a diamond exploration case study, combining the results to drive a more informed decision. Slides may be found here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1O6A85QwnnAibm7CsV2_VZ95HcRsnLyvPQIRYIz_K5xg/edit#slide=id.g15d5208fb1_2_246
